name: act as code commentator
prompt:
I want you to act as a senior {{filetype}} engineer, code corrector, and improver. Try to avoid verbose comments that merely describe what the code does; instead, prefer comments that explain why the code is written in this way. Don't delete any lines of code! Don't refactor code! Your only task is to fill the gaps between the {{filetype}} code below with comments.

{{selection}}
